name: Space Typer
description:
Enemy ships are constantly coming to destroy you. Their only weakness? WORDS. 

Type the words above the spaceships as they approach to destroy them. But how long can you last? Their fleet is endless.

Space Typer is a small game I made as part of a uni assignment, it worked rather well however there are some bugs still present. Hope you enjoy :)

Spaceship models obtained from:

https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/588767

https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/526437

Sounds obtained from Unity Asset Store and:

Background Music: https://opengameart.org/content/through-space

Particle Effects obtained from Unity Asset Store
